experiment.name: Transcription profiling by array of A. Thaliana Wild-type (Col-0) and mutant plants (adg1-1, tpt-2, adg1-1/tpt-2) to investigate response to low and high light stress

description.text: Wild-type (Col-0) and mutant plants (adg1-1, tpt-2, adg1-1/tpt-2) were grown for 28 days under low light conditions and were then transferred to HL. Leaf samples for transcriptional profiling were taken at time 0 (before transfer to high light) and 4 hours and 48 hours (2 days) after transfer to high light.

bibliography.authors: Schmitz J, Heinrichs L, Scossa F, Fernie AR, Oelze ML, Dietz KJ, Rothbart M, Grimm B, Flügge UI, Häusler RE.
bibliography.title: The essential role of sugar metabolism in the acclimation response of Arabidopsis thaliana to high light intensities.
